alert.note: Alert for Cerro Gordo; Hancock (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 8:50PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL HANCOCK AND WESTERN CERRO GORDO COUNTIES THROUGH 915 PM CDT... At 850 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Eagle Lake, or 7 miles west of Garner, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Garner, Britt, Mason City Municipal Airport, Clear Lake, Eagle Lake, Ventura, Duncan, Miller, Hayfield, Clear Lake State Park, McIntosh Woods State Park, and Eagle Lake State Park. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 193 and 197. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central Iowa.
